text: is a city in the Chūbu region of Japan on the island of Honshu.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2005). "Matsumoto" in Japan Encyclopedia, p. 618. It has been recognized as a special city since 2000.Jacobs, A.J. "Japan's Evolving Nested Municipal Hierarchy: The Race for Local Power in the 2000s," Urban Studies Research, Vol. 2011 (2011), p. 9 [PDF 9 of 14]. Retrieved 2012-12-17. ==History== Matsumoto was the capital of Shinano Province during the Edo period. ==Related pages== * Matsumoto Yamaga F.C. ==References== ==Other websites== * Matsumoto official website * http://youkoso.city.matsumoto.nagano.jp/ Category:Cities in Chūbu Category:Settlements in Nagano Prefecture
title: Matsumoto, Nagano
